hmcdm 1.2.0.9000
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

ETAmat()

Generate ideal response matrix

L_real_list

Observed response times list

Learning_fit()

Model fit statistics of learning models

MCMC_learning()

Gibbs sampler for learning models

OddsRatio()

Compute item pairwise odds ratio

Q_examinee

List of Q-matrices for each examinee.

Q_list

List of Q matrices

Qs

Array of Q matrices

TPmat()

Generate monotonicity matrix

Test_versions

Subjects' test version

Y_real_list

Observed response accuracy list

hmcdm-package

hmcdm: Hidden Markov Cognitive Diagnosis Models for Learning

inv_bijectionvector()

Convert integer to attribute pattern

point_estimates_learning()

Obtain learning model point estimates

rOmega()

Generate a random transition matrix for the first order hidden Markov model

random_Q()

Generate random Q matrix

rinvwish()

Generate Random Inverse Wishart Distribution

simDINA()

Simulate DINA model responses (entire cube)

simNIDA()

Simulate NIDA model responses (entire cube)

sim_RT()

Simulate item response times based on Wang et al.'s (2018) joint model of response times and accuracy in learning

sim_resp_DINA()

Simulate DINA model responses (single vector)

sim_resp_NIDA()

Simulate NIDA model responses (single vector)

sim_resp_rRUM()

Simulate rRUM model responses (single vector)

simrRUM()

Simulate rRUM model responses (entire cube)

simulate_alphas_FOHM()

Generate attribute trajectories under the first order hidden Markov model

simulate_alphas_HO_joint()

Generate attribute trajectories under the Higher-Order Hidden Markov DCM with latent learning ability as a random effect

simulate_alphas_HO_sep()

Generate attribute trajectories under the Higher-Order Hidden Markov DCM

simulate_alphas_indept()

Generate attribute trajectories under the simple independent-attribute learning model

test_order

Test block ordering of each test version
